markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 4" pfs="Standard">
[Nature's Bounty](/Spells.aspx?ID=1823)
<actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=554" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
<trait label="Plant" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=125" />
<trait label="Vitality" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=509" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 377 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Domain**
[Nature](/Domains.aspx?ID=85)

<row gap="medium">

 

**Requirements** You have a free hand
</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

A palm-sized raw fruit or vegetable of your choice appears in your open hand. A creature can consume the food with an Interact action to regain 3d10+12 Hit Points and be nourished as if it had eaten a meal. If uneaten, the food crumbles to dust after 1 minute.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The Hit Points restored increase by 6.
name: Nature's Bounty

summary_markdown: A palm-sized raw fruit or vegetable of your choice appears in your open hand.
text: Nature's Bounty Single Action Source Player Core pg. 377 2.0 Domain Nature Requirements You have a free hand --- A palm-sized raw fruit or vegetable of your choice appears in your open hand. A creature can consume the food with an Interact action to regain 3d10+12 Hit Points and be nourished as if it had eaten a meal. If uneaten, the food crumbles to dust after 1 minute. --- Heightened (+1) The Hit Points restored increase by 6.
